Name: Duchess' house
Texts:
You are at the Duchess' house. You plead with her to take you to the croquet game to meet the Queen
She refuses stating that it is already she won't have time to prepare.
The Chesire Cat with an ever smiling face informs you that the March Hare has a curse and if you go to his house and back, time will go back to afternoon.
Hurry! Let's go to the March Hare's house
You are at the Duchess' house.
Very nice! The duchess has had enough time to do her make up. Let's go to the croquet playground.
